A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great visuals with unexpected plot twists. I completely enjoyed this journey\, and that while providing imagery similar to ESB early\, it broke off the familiar themes\, which made it more enjoyable.  I find the fan feedback amusing as the detractors said TFA was too much like A New Hope.  And The Last Jedi is too different than previous Star Wars movies.  The bottom line is some people are never happy\, and trolling behind a faceless app on their phone is empowering.  Great Movie\, that is can't miss!  Take it from the pro's who get paid to rate!
